profile_summary:
As a Senior Graphics Engineer with extensive expertise in performance optimization, real-time rendering, and cross-platform rendering, I leverage technologies such as **Unity**, **Vulkan**, and **Metal** to enhance graphics performance and quality. My strong skill set includes advanced shader development with **HLSL**, **GLSL**, and **MSL**, as well as utilizing **Scriptable Render Pipeline** for custom rendering solutions. 
With 8 years of experience in full-stack development, I possess a solid foundation in building scalable applications. I excel in performance profiling using tools like **RenderDoc** and **Perfetto**, and I have comprehensive experience in GPU-driven pipelines, including techniques such as global illumination and temporal anti-aliasing. My innovative contributions have improved rendering efficiency and graphical fidelity across various platforms, demonstrating my ability to develop robust solutions for both mobile and enterprise-level applications.
